name: Mtext
body:
# Moses Text - the incredibly limited text editor!

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/DannyMoses/mtext.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/DannyMoses/mtext)

## Installation
To install, simply download the repository and run:
`./configure`

### Planned Features:
1. The ability to open files and view their contents
2. The ability to navigate to and display specific lines
3. The ability to edit specific lines
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
